shorts.title: Community Briefs 7/17/25
shorts.description: Greater Scranton YMCA receives grant funds for STEM Lab The Greater Scranton YMCA was awarded a $25,000 grant from the William G. McGowan Charitable Fund in April. The grant will support the creation of a STEM Lab at the organization’s facility at 706 N. Blakely St. in Dunmore. Through the creation of a STEM Lab, the Greater Scranton YMCA will provide students enrolled in the School-Age Program, Summer Day Camp Program and additional programming to be developed with the opportunity to learn, collaborate with peers and practice problem-solving skills. The lab will give the organization an opportunity to engage children […]
shorts.content: Greater Scranton YMCA receives grant funds for STEM Lab The Greater Scranton YMCA was awarded a $25,000 grant from the William G. McGowan Charitable Fund in April. The grant will support the creation of a STEM Lab at the organization’s facility at 706 N. Blakely St. in Dunmore. Through the creation of a STEM Lab, the Greater Scranton YMCA will provide students enrolled in the School-Age Program, Summer Day Camp Program and additional programming to be developed with the opportunity to learn, collaborate with peers and practice problem-solving skills. shorts.title: School Briefs 7/17/25
shorts.description: Alvernia University Olivia Blockberger of Peckville graduated with a Master of Science in occupational therapy degree and a Bachelor of Science in health science in May. Blockberger was also named to the dean’s list for the spring 2025 semester. To be eligible, students must carry a semester GPA of 3.5 or better. James Madison University Sabrina Cimoch of Forest City was named to the dean’s list for the spring 2025 semester. Cimoch is majoring in communication studies. To qualify, students must earn a GPA of between 3.5 and 3.899. Lebanon Valley College Logan Fuga of Jermyn was named to the […]

shorts.title: Protestors and supporters show up for VP Vance's visit
shorts.title_distilled: Protestors and supporters show up for VP Vance's visit.
shorts.description: WEST PITTSTON, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— With the vice president's visit to NEPA, came groups of supporters and protestors. 28/22's Joe Mason spoke to people on both sides. Vice President J.D. Vance making a stop in northeastern Pennsylvania, touting the passing of President Trump's Big Beautiful Bill. Some people came out to support, others to protest. [...]
shorts.content: WEST PITTSTON, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— With the vice president's visit to NEPA, came groups of supporters and protestors. 28/22's Joe Mason spoke to people on both sides. Vice President J.D. Vance making a stop in northeastern Pennsylvania, touting the passing of President Trump's Big Beautiful Bill. Some people came out to support, others to protest. [...]
